DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group, three-arm, multicenter study of the safety and PK of ELND005 administered orally for 4 weeks. This study will enroll Down Syndrome patients 18 to 45 years of age (inclusive) without dementia.
DOC.brief_title: A 4-Week Safety Study of Oral ELND005 in Young Adults With Down Syndrome Without Dementia
DOC.criteria: 18 45 years of age Has an IQ of > 40 (KBIT) Able and willing to have a brain MRI Symptoms of dementia or worsening cognition over the past year. Has a history of hepatitis B, hepatitis C, or HIV
